remarks: A member of the value of the partial isomorphism A is a translation i.e. a vector.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2014.)
statement:
diass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
diass.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
diass.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diass.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
diass.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diael $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) /\ F e. ( I ` X ) ) -> F e. T ) $.
